snippet: A rejected defense motion to dismiss charges against Brig. Gen. Jeffrey A. Sinclair alleged that the lead prosecutor had raised questions about the credibility of the general’s main accuser.
abstract: Military judge Col James L Pohl rejects defense motion to dismiss charges against Brig Gen Jeffrey A Sinclair, decorated former deputy commander of United States forces in southern Afghanistan who has been charged with sexually assaulting a junior officer; judge's ruling clears way for long-awaited trial before jury of generals.
lead_paragraph: A rejected defense motion to dismiss charges against Brig. Gen. Jeffrey A. Sinclair alleged that the lead prosecutor had raised questions about the credibility of the general’s main accuser.

headline.main: Judge Won’t Dismiss Sexual Assault Charges Against General
headline.print_headline: Judge Won’t Dismiss Sex Assault Charges Against General

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
